options.fsb-interop.title: FabricSkyBoxes Interop Configuration
options.fsb-interop.interoperability.too: If enabled, the mod will attempt to read/load MCPatcher/OptiFine Custom Skies.
options.fsb-interop.process_optifine.too: If enabled, the mod will attempt to read/load OptiFine Custom Skies.
options.fsb-interop.process_mcpatcher.to: If enabled, the mod will attempt to read/load MCPatcher Custom Skies.
options.fsb-interop.debug_mode.tooltip: If enabled, the mod will output conversion results and error logs in conversion process.
options.fsb-interop.clear_fsb_format_sky: If enabled, the mod will remove all native FSB skyboxes. This will break resource packs that are FSB only! Proceed with caution!
fsb-interop.clear_fsb_format_sky.message: FSB-Interop is preventing native FabricSkyBoxes resource packs from loading!
fsb-interop.interoperability.message: FSB-Interop is converting MCPatcher/OptiFine custom skies resource packs! Any visual bugs are likely caused by FSB-Interop. Please do not report these issues to FabricSkyBoxes nor Resource Pack creators!
